@id: TO_BE_ADDED, this is like an IRI for the JSON-LD itself
name: Protocol for 18S sequencing AWI
description: Methodological document providing a step by step description of 18S rRNA sequencing as carried out by the AWI partner for the GLOMICON intercomparison project
subjectOf: TO_BE_ADDED, IRI to output of this protocol (e.g. raw sequence data)
license: TO_BE_ADDED, assume tat this will be CC-BY, but this needs to be decided together with the partners
